name: rhonda vaughan
text: Friendly and fun staff. Appears that employees enjoy their job and they work together well. Food was ready in just a short wait time and pizza was delicious. Prices are very good. I love being able to use the drive-thru service which means a lot to me as I am handicapped.

name: Richard Seth
text: Overall the staff is pretty nice. The unfortunate part is that our order is consistently wrong. If you're ordering the menu standard items, you should be fine. If you need anything custom then I would say your chances are 50/50 at best. We'll probably go back to Geppetto's. It's more money but, at least you get what you ordered.

name: Nick Fitz
text: This is the nicest LC I've been in! The manager and staff are friendly and very helpful. Will definitely be back!

name: Kari Felts
text: Employees are friendly and pizza was great. I wish they would give more attention to cleanliness. The store needs a scrub over. If it‚Äôs dirty in the front, so I can‚Äôt imagine what the back looks like...

name: Laura gargiulo
text: Love this pizza place and the Denver location is superior with it's cleanliness, freshness and far above average employees. The management has done a fantastic job training these attentive young people to prepare perfectly cooked pizzas and ‚Ä¶More

name: David M
text: Suppose to be "hot and ready". NEVER is. Place is ridiculous now. You have to wait in line at least 20-30 min every time. They never have pizzas ready. Place has really gone downhill over the past few months. Use to go all the time, never again.

name: Todd Rich
text: When I received the wrong order I took it back and told the girl it was wrong and she as a matter of fact told me that is what I ordered. It was not what I ordered after she saw I was unsatisfied with my order she began trying to make it ‚Ä¶More

name: Zachary Vause
text: If you like having your order take forever an getting food poisoning then I‚Äôd definitely recommend this place. Otherwise get Pizza Hut it‚Äôs literally around the corner an they actually have staff who can handle pizza an other various food products in a more timely manner an wont poison you in the process otherwise don‚Äôt eat here.

name: Obi Zerver
text: We walked in after an unexpectedly long and trying day, and were so pleasantly welcomed by the Manager, we thought it noteworthy. Kevin's energetic and positive greeting immediately turned our frowns upside down.  This guy is a testament to ‚Ä¶More

name: GRASS GUY
text: Great pizza and great service. Kevin really takes his job seriously and is a super manager. The pizza is always fresh and the atmosphere is really superb. He really deserves to be a regional manager, but I would hate to see him leave the Denver area.

name: Kari Wyatt
text: Thin most bestest...  Is the best

name: David Johnson
text: Quick and fresh. Fast service and always great associates that want to help you. Always recommend to anyone.

name: Dave Kuhlmeyer
text: Sung by little  Caesars to pick up a couple of pepperonis for some guys working on the house got there at 10:45 and already had pizzas in the hot box. Great personality on the workers hate to see you guys closing this location can't beat the pizza for the money  üçïüçï

name: Tim Vranich
text: Usually a great place to pick up a pizza in a hurry. I tried to call in a special order and was told by the lady on the phone that a call in order wasn't required that they ALWAYS have the 3 meat deep dish ready for pickup. When I arrived I ‚Ä¶More

name: Tonya Brown
text: I don't know if they need more staff but it has been ridiculous lately on Friday evening to get a pizza. What is going on at this Denver location lately. 3 times my husband went to get us busy and gave up and got out of line because drive through not moving over 45 mins later.

name: michael johnson
text: Its Little Caesar's, you know what it is... Its cheapo pizza.  But have to try the bacon wrapped deep fish, mind blown.

name: Jason Parks
text: Best pizza at the cheapest price. You can cook a $7 digiorno or immediately eat a $5 little Ceasers pizza ‚Ä¶More

text: I like Little Caesars but this place always has a very long wait. Pizzas are never ready when we go here.
